name: Rune
description: SVG glyph creator using paper.js. Grid based design system to produce letter forms, icons etc then export as SVG from browser.

scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js -s' 'npm run watch:css -s' 'npm run build:html -s' 'http-server ./build/ -p 8000'
scripts.build: echo 'building app...' && npm run lib && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run copy-statics
scripts.build:js: echo 'compiling javascript...' && browserify -x react -x paper -x lodash ./src/app/app.js > ./build/app.min.js && echo 'Finished compiling.'
scripts.lib: echo 'compiling libraries...' && browserify -r react -r react-draggable -r paper -r lodash -r signals -r ./src/extendLibs.js -o ./build/lib.min.js && echo 'Finished lib compile'
